page.title: 06All About Me - Joanna
page.content: My name is Joanna Inez **** . My Mummy and Grandad are Argentinian. That's how I got the name Inez because Grandad's sister has the same birthdate as me and her name is Inez. I am 10 years old. I am 1.40m.tall and weigh 27kg.I stay thin because I am a fussy eater.I have a sister called Caroline who is rather a pain when she bounces on my bed. I have the tiniest bedroom ever as it only holds a bed. I love reading and amazingly spiders! In fact I adore all animals and the sheep in the back field will eat out of my hand while the ewes will let me stroke the baby lambs. In our garden we seem to have a farmyard,what with all our pets: one dog, one puppy,14 hens, one cockerel,two goldfish,and a hamster. so I suppose it is a good job I like animals.My home life is great.
